member.name: M:EventsITAcademy.API.Controllers.EventController.Get(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns event based on provided id, Authorization is not required
member.response: Returns the specific todo and corresponding subtasks data
If the todo was not found or todo does not belong to the user

member.name: M:EventsITAcademy.API.Controllers.EventController.GetAll(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns list of user's todos with subtasks
member.remarks:
Note: Status is an optional query parameter to filter todos based on the following statuses:
1 - Active
2 - Done
By default Status is 0, which retrieves all todos regardless of the status

member.name: M:EventsITAcademy.API.Controllers.EventController.Put(System.Threading.CancellationToken,EventsITAcademy.Application.Events.Requests.UpdateEventRequestModel)
member.summary: Updates a todo and its corresponding subtasks
member.returns: Returns newly created todo with subtasks
member.response: Returns newly created todo with subtasks
If the todo or subtask was not found

member.name: M:EventsITAcademy.API.Controllers.UserController.Register(System.Threading.CancellationToken,EventsITAcademy.Application.Users.Requests.CreateUserRequestModel)
member.summary: registers user with provided username and password

member.name: P:EventsITAcademy.API.Infrastructure.Localizations.ValidationErrorMessages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:EventsITAcademy.API.Infrastructure.Localizations.ValidationErrorMessages.DescMaxLength
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Description can not be be empty and should consist of at most 350 characters.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Email address is a required field.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Event title should not be empty and should consist of at most 100 characters.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The end date and time of the event should be greater than the current time.

member.name: P:EventsITAcademy.API.Infrastructure.Localizations.ValidationErrorMessages.InvalidEmail
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid email format.

member.name: P:EventsITAcademy.API.Infrastructure.Localizations.ValidationErrorMessages.NumberOfTicketsRequired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Number of tickets field is mandatory and must be greater than 0.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Password is a required field and the length should be between 6 and 30.
